Bash(node -e "const {execSync} = require\(''child_process''\); try { console.log\(execSync\(''flutter devices''\).toString\(\)\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(e.stdout?.toString\(\)\); console.log\(e.stderr?.toString\(\)\); }")

Bash(node -e "const {execSync} = require\(''child_process''\); try { console.log\(execSync\(''flutter build web --release'', {stdio: ''pipe''}\).toString\(\)\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(''stdout:'', e.stdout?.toString\(\)\); console.log\(''stderr:'', e.stderr?.toString\(\)\); console.log\(''status:'', e.status\); }")

Bash(node -e "const {execSync} = require\(''child_process''\); try { console.log\(execSync\(''firebase deploy --only hosting'', {stdio: ''pipe''}\).toString\(\)\); } catch\(e\) { console.log\(''stdout:'', e.stdout?.toString\(\)\); console.log\(''stderr:'', e.stderr?.toString\(\)\); console.log\(''status:'', e.status\); }")
